import adcpy.TRDIstuff.TRDIpd0tonetcdf as TRDIpd0
import numpy as np
pd0_input_file = here.joinpath('../data/demo2/10631whV20784profilestiny.pd0')
serial_number = '23857'
delta_t = '3600'
netcdf_output = here.joinpath('11121whV23857profiles.cdf')
time_type = 'CF'
ensembles_to_process = [0, np.inf]
ensemble_count, netcdf_index, read_error = TRDIpd0.convert_pd0_to_netcdf(
    pd0_input_file, netcdf_output, ensembles_to_process, serial_number,
    time_type, delta_t)
print(ensemble_count)
return ensemble_count, netcdf_index, read_error
